text: Aristides Gomes (born 8 November 1954Page on Gomes at PAIGC website .) was the Prime Minister of Guinea-Bissau, from April 2018 until February 2020. He was previously Prime Minister before from 2 November 2005"President appoints controversial new prime minister", IRIN, November 2, 2005. to 13 April 2007. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Guinea-Bissau
title: Aristides Gomes
